com.nequissimus.university.k1584.ui.enums

Enum TokenSize

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<TokenSize>
      • com.nequissimus.university.k1584.ui.enums.TokenSize
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<TokenSize>

    public enum TokenSize
extends java.lang.Enum<TokenSize>
    Preset values for token sizes.
    Radius(R) is the radius used when one token is displayed.
    FontSize(F) is used as the font size for when there are >1 tokens.

    SMALL: R3 F11
    MEDIUM: R6 F13
    LARGE: R10 F16
    VERY_LARGE: R20 F24
